attributes.title: Stop
attributes.review: Ban the app because trump is racist and isn’t doing anything! about covid 19 and they are going to banned tiktok what will I do all day sit bored no stop this now

attributes.title: Horrible app 🤢
attributes.review: It deleted all my photos and stuff from my phone don’t get it

attributes.title: Trump 2020.. sike.
attributes.review: This is the worst app!!!! I thought that since Trump is so amazing how app would be too, but it’s not. Laggy and just overall it’s terrible

attributes.title: Really bad.
attributes.review: This app is slow, stupid, glitchy, ugly—basically any negative adjective describes this app perfectly. You know what they say, sucky app, even suckier human. Piece of💩

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: The worst app ever it literally crashed my phone and now I have to buy a new one..I hate this app

attributes.title: DISGUSTING APPLICATION!!!!
attributes.review: I’m a HUGE Trump fan and this really made me reconsider who to vote for. This app made threats towards my children and put CHINESE SOFTWARE on my phone. 0/10 would not recommend. Bad app=bad president.

attributes.title: if i could make this 0 stars i would
attributes.review: this app is FULL of lies and disrespect. the racism, fascism, and homophobia that it inquired is nauseating. DON'T GET THIS APP, IF YOU DO BE SURE TO RATE IT 1 STAR!! this app should be banned for discriminatory purposes.

attributes.title: The Worst App I Have Ever Seen
attributes.review: The orange man scared me and it was so glitchy I couldn’t get off the website. 👎0/10 don’t recommend.

attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: Since I downloaded this app my phone was glitching it was a bad mistake to even download this app

attributes.title: Worst app ever.
attributes.review: After getting the app my dog ate pluto and then she stared drinking my bed and flying all over the ocean and walking on the ceiling. If I could rate it lower I would ✨🧚🏼‍♀️💕
